      double TargetProfitPolicy.meetTargetProfit(MyFoodora myFoodora, double targetProfit)
      Sets one of the profit related information : service fee, markup percentage or delivery cost based on last month income to meet a target profit given the formula : profitForOneOrder = orderPrice * markupPercentage + serviceFee - deliveryCost
